title: The Future of Etcher
text: Our near future and longer term plans for Etcher, and the great use cases that it should enable!

title: Tabster
text: Tabster is eliminating the hassle of payment in bars and restaurants, allowing friends to enjoy their time together without worrying about dividing up the bill.

title: ResinOS Updates from the Dashboard
text: An experimental feature added to resin.io recently is the ability to run resinOS updates for your devices (for some hardware types) right from the dashboard!

title: Work with us!
text: We are actively recruiting for Teachnical Content Lead, Solution Architect, Security Engineer, and other roles.
